title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4404.4 - Bets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4404.4 - Bets

State Regulations
A bet may be placed for win, place, or show in each race, or for a daily double, an exacta, a quinella, or a triple. All other types of
wagering other than those enumerated in this section are prohibited without the
prior written approval of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4404.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
